decription: Manages a user's progress through the lessons. Each lesson has
a JSON file named lesson.json that manages the user's progress
through a lesson. The following naming conventions are used:
- Each lesson is in a directory that has a numeric name: 1..N
- Lesson slides are named osk_c_tutor_lesson_X.pdf where X matches
The lesson.json file defines which source files need to be updated
in the lesson by setting 'src-files-completed' to false
